thread.title: The Blue Jays play game 5 of the ALDS in Toronto
thread.title_full: The Blue Jays play game 5 of the ALDS in Toronto

title: The Blue Jays play game 5 of the ALDS in Toronto
text:
The Blue Jays play game 5 of the ALDS in Toronto Add to ... The Globe and Mail 
Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 4:10PM EDT 
Last updated Next Prev Kevin Pillar #11 of the Toronto Blue Jays makes a diving catch on a ball hit by Josh Hamilton #32 of the Texas Rangers in the fourth inning in game five of the American League Division Series at Rogers Centre on October 14, 2015 in Toronto, Canada.(Tom Szczerbowski/Getty Images) Kevin Pillar #11 of the Toronto Blue Jays shows the ball in front of teammate Ben Revere #7 after Pillar made a diving catch on a ball hit by Josh Hamilton #32 of the Texas Rangers in the fourth inning in game five of the American League Division Series at Rogers Centre on October 14, 2015 in Toronto, Canada.(Tom Szczerbowski/Getty Images) Toronto Blue Jay Josh Donaldson hols on to his helmet as he's tagged out at first base by Texas Ranger Mitch Moreland in game five of the American League Division Series Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Toronto Blue Jay Ben Revere (L) celebrates with teammate Chris Colabello after scoring a run against the Texas Rangers in the third inning in game five of the American League Division Series Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) Toronto Blue Jays' Jose Bautista, centre, gestures in front of Texas Rangers' Rougned Odor, left, following an RBI double during third inning game five American League Division Series baseball action in Toronto on Wednesday, October 14, 2015.(Darren Calabrese/The Canadian Press) Toronto Blue Jay Chris Colabello falls back after a swing and a miss from a pitch by Cole Hamels of the Texas Rangers during the third inning of game five of the American League Division Series Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Toronto Blue Jays starting pitcher Marcus Stroman reacts after giving up a double during the first inning of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) Texas Rangers' Shin-Soo Choo (17) celebrates with teammates after hitting a solo home run during third inning game 5 American League Division Series baseball action in Toronto on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015.(Nathan Denette/The Canadian Press) Toronto Blue Jay second baseman Ryan Goins has words with home plate umpire Dale Scott after striking out in the third inning of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Ryan Goins #17 of the Toronto Blue Jays attempts to turn a double play as Prince Fielder #84 of the Texas Rangers is out at second base in the first inning in game five of the American League Division Series at Rogers Centre on October 14, 2015 in Toronto, Canada.(Tom Szczerbowski/Getty Images) Delino DeShields of the Texas Rangers slides safely home as Toronto Blu Jays catcher Russell Martin misses the tag during the first inning of game five of the American League Division Series Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Toronto Blue Jays starting pitcher Marcus Stroman on the mound during the first inning of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Texas Rangers center fielder Delino DeShields (right) scores a run past the tag of Toronto Blue Jays catcher Russell Martin (left) in the first inning in game five of the ALDS at Rogers Centre.(Nick Turchiaro/USA Today Sports) Toronto Blue Jays starting pitcher Marcus Stroman winds up for a pitch during the first inning of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) The Texas Rangers stretch before taking on the Toronto Blue Jays in game five of the American League Division Series at Rogers Centre on October 14, 2015 in Toronto, Canada.(Tom Szczerbowski/Getty Images) Former Toronto Blue Jay George Bell throws out the first pitch of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) Jays fan Tim Daly sports face paint and a Blue Jay hat as he waits for the start of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail) Toronto Blue Jays fans wait for the start of game five of the American League Division Series against the Texas Rangers Oct 14, 2015 in Toronto.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) See more galleries
